short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make sure you are reminded of question of the day for leetcode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"LeetCodeReminder" is a Chrome extension designed specifically for coding enthusiasts and professionals who are regular users of LeetCode, a popular platform for coding practice and interview preparation. This extension is tailored to enhance the user experience on LeetCode by providing timely reminders and personalized statistics.

Detailed Description:
Personalized Practice Tracking:
User Handle Integration: Users can enter their LeetCode handle, allowing the extension to retrieve and display personalized data related to their progress.
Progress Overview: Showcases the number of problems solved, categorized by difficulty levels (Easy, Medium, Hard). This feature motivates users by visualizing their achievements and areas for improvement.
Daily Engagement Boost:
Daily Question Reminder: The centerpiece of this extension is its ability to remind users of LeetCode's 'Question of the Day'. This feature ensures that users don't miss out on daily practice, which is crucial for skill development and consistency.
Easy Access to Question of the Day: The question is displayed directly within the extension, providing quick and convenient access.
User-Friendly Interface:
Simple and Intuitive Design: The HTML and CSS-based interface is clean, straightforward, and easy to navigate, ensuring a smooth user experience.
Editable User Handle: Flexibility is provided to change the LeetCode handle as required, accommodating changes in user preferences or accounts.
Technical Specifications:
Efficient Scripting and Data Handling: Utilizes JavaScript for dynamic data fetching and display. This includes interaction with LeetCode's API or database for real-time information.
Chrome Extension Permissions: Employs permissions like activeTab, scripting, tabs, storage, and background for full functionality, ensuring a seamless integration with the Chrome browser.
Manifest Version 3 Compatibility: Adheres to the latest Chrome extension standards for security and performance.
Chrome Web Store Appeal:
"LeetCodeReminder" stands out in the Chrome Web Store for its specific focus on enhancing the LeetCode experience. It's a must-have tool for anyone looking to make their coding practice more consistent and effective. The extension serves as a daily companion, keeping users engaged and informed about their progress on LeetCode.

Conclusion:
Whether you're preparing for coding interviews or just looking to improve your programming skills, "LeetCodeReminder" is an essential tool. Its convenience, simplicity, and focus on daily practice make it an invaluable asset for any LeetCode user. Download it today from the Chrome Web Store and take your coding practice to the next level!
